content.text:
# List of Warner Bros. films (2010–2019)

The following is a list of films produced and/or distributed by Warner Bros. in the 2010s. This list does not include direct-to-video releases.
2010
{| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;"
|-
! scope="col" style="width:130px;"| Release date
! Title
! Notes
|-
| style="text-align:right;"| January 15, 2010 || The Book of Eli || North American and Turkish theatrical distribution only; produced by Alcon Entertainment and Silver Pictures
|-
| style="text-align:right;"| January 29, 2010 || Edge of Darkness || North and Latin American and Spanish distribution only; co-production with GK Films, BBC Films and Icon Productions
|-
| style="text-align:right;"| February 12, 2010 || ''Valentine's Day || distribution only; produced by New Line Cinema, Wayne Rice Films and Karz Entertainment
